name: Deeper
body:
## Welcome to Deeper!
Deeper is a 2D Video Game Created by @OrionDark7 with [Python](https://python.org) & [Pygame](http://www.pygame.org). It is a game set in the Depths of an unknown world, where you can Build, Dig, and Explore freely. Version 0.1 is released! Follow the instructions below to download!

##How to Download:
Dont automatticaly hit the Donwload button, there are specific things to download first, or the game won't run:

Step 1. Download [Python 2.7](https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-2712/)

Step 2. Download [Pygame 1.9](http://www.pygame.org/download.shtml)

Step 3. Open and finish the installation process for Python & Pygame. (Don't worry, they aren't viruses, I use both all the time.)

Step 4. Hit the .zip Download button.

Step 5. Extract the .zip file.

Step 6. Open the file Deeper.py, if everything is installed correctly, the game should run. Enjoy!
